name: OOP.vim
description:
This is my first try to make O.O.P. style in vim, i'm only a beginner in Vim, but i'm sure it will be usable for you all.

Simple and easy. This is the first version so expect bugs!!

This is only an utility, and I will not assume any responsibility using it.
install_details:
You only need to source the OOP.vim file like this:

so <path>/oop.vim

Or take it to your initialization files, it has another file called CarsOOPSample.vim, it's an OOP sample take a look.
